response_requirements.initial_response_description: Agency must respond within 5 business days by acknowledging receipt and providing reasonable time estimate, providing records, or denying with legal basis
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If immediate response not possible, must provide reasonable time estimate based on nature and volume of records
response_requirements.extension_notes: Must communicate regularly about status; estimate based on request complexity

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: May charge for customized services; cannot charge for staff time to search or review records for redaction
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: May charge actual cost of copying; cannot exceed actual cost

exemptions.description: Personal information in files maintained for employees, appointees, or elected officials
Law enforcement investigative records and intelligence information
Personal information where disclosure would violate right to privacy
Preliminary drafts, notes, and internal communications
Records protected by attorney-client privilege and attorney work product
Valuable commercial information including trade secrets
Examination questions and answers for employment or academic testing

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal; direct court action for enforcement
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court shall award reasonable attorney fees and costs to prevailing requester; penalties up to $100/day for improper denials

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: No specific format required; may be made in person, by mail, or email; must request identifiable records
requester_requirements.specific_format: Must identify public records requested; cannot be overly broad

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Must designate Public Records Officer (PRO) as primary contact
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Must provide reasonable time estimate if immediate response not possible
agency_obligations.liberal_construction: Liberally construed to promote public policy; exemptions narrowly construed
agency_obligations.clarification_assistance: May seek clarification but must provide reasonable time estimate

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Washington statute. 5 business day response required (acknowledge and provide estimate, provide records, or deny). Cannot charge for search or redaction labor - only customized services. Public Records Officer required. No administrative appeal - direct Superior Court action. Attorney fees and penalties up to $100/day. Liberal construction favoring disclosure.
